month.description: The month and year when the crimes occurred, in the format MM.YYYY.

Total_crimes.description: The total number of crimes reported in that month.

Serious.description: The number of serious crimes reported in that month.

Huge_damage.description: The number of crimes that caused huge damage reported in that month.

Ecological.description: The number of ecological crimes reported in that month.

Terrorism.description: The number of terrorism-related crimes reported in that month.

Extremism.description: The number of extremism-related crimes reported in that month.

Murder.description: The number of murders reported in that month.

Harm_to_health.description: The number of crimes causing harm to health reported in that month.

Rape.description: The number of rapes reported in that month.

Theft.description: The number of thefts reported in that month.

Vehicle_theft.description: The number of vehicle thefts reported in that month.

Fraud_scam.description: The number of frauds or scams reported in that month.

Hooligan.description: The number of hooliganism incidents reported in that month.

Drugs.description: The number of drug-related crimes reported in that month.

Weapons.description: The number of weapon-related crimes reported in that month.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in crime statistics analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the crime data in Russia, please predict the total number of crimes.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted total number of crimes is {prediction}.
